Name: JAMM
About the game: JAMM is a map maker that makes it simple and easy to bring your vision to life quickly giving you more time to focus on the story. Make maps in minutes, not hours. FINAL PRODUCT 2D Export Perspective or Orthographic maps to high resolution jpg/png images and snap Immersive views to share with the party. Hide UI to send map to a TV or use 3rd party software to record your screen to make animated maps. 3D Export OBJ/MTL files for use in other applications. See tutorial on how to work with OBJ file including how to quickly and easily take your JAMM maps into TableTop Simulator in minutes! + 99% of models can now be exported to OBJ format! At this time a few Trees, Ships, and Cars will not be exported. UI Simple and stream-lined. Put the most common tools up front and center. Layer on additional content as you see necessary. ENVIRONMENT ELEMENTS BUILDING TOOLS A tools primary function will monitor the terrain under the cursor and find an appropriate version to place. eg. Placing a fence on stone will create a stone fence. A secondary function is also available if you wish to have greater control over which elements are placed. eg. Select any fence type and place wherever you'd like it. WEATHER / SUN / THEMES Customize the style of your map by adjusting the time of day, 8 weather options, and 16 color themes for many unique combinations. GRIDS 12 grid options are available from 'none' to various squares, hexes, and textures. 2D ASSETS While this app focuses on speed and simplicity you may wish to tap into your stash of 2d jpg/png assets. JAMM provides a folder for you to copy over assets for use within the JAMM environment.
